Settings.Full: Battle Armor Jump systems provide {0} Hey Jump Capacity. enables Jumping Anti Mech Attacks; BA Do not suffer DFA self Damage.
Battle Armor Equipment uses the Specialist Slot.
Battle Armors have specialisted boarding claws and actuators
Battle Armor Weapons represent a single suits weapon
Battle Armor Stealth. Making units harder to hit and detect. Countered by Probes
Battle Armor Mimetic Stealth. Making units harder to hit and detect. Countered by Probes
Battle Armor are powered infantry suits. Mostly Immune to effects of Heat.
